entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 20 cm across lower Richelieu. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
